title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, April 17, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Nick Hornby (1957), author of “High Fidelity” (1995), which was adapted into a movie in 2000 and a Hulu TV series this past February.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Nick Hornby (1957), author of “High Fidelity” (1995), which was adapted into a movie in 2000 and a Hulu TV series this past February.
